ModMetaData.name: LMC072.更快速的排水泵
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Both adds a new very fast advanced moisture pump and make Vanilla pumps to work faster. 新增了先进排水泵顺带提升了原版排水泵的工作速度。
ModMetaData.author: Wemd
